We are dedicated in helping business discover and define the opportunity, concept and strategy for new product. Our clients consist of leaders from various industries, including those well-known names : Kohler,Sony,Samsung, OPPO, Meizu,Lenovo,TOYOTA, GuangZhou Auto, ChangAn Auto, BSH, Whirlpool, Supor,Fotile,Robam,Midea,Changhong,Aux, AkzonNobel,LuoLai,Decathlon, Otis,3M,KONE etc.
experiences.title: Founder & CEO

experiences.description: Establishing China studio of global design from scratch, covering the region of greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service design. Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( in China for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process. Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and product organization.
experiences.title: Design Director

experiences.description: Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of global design. Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing strategy and material R&D as well. Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas such as renewable energy house, high-speed train, electric vehicle, mobile computing etc.
experiences.title: Design Manager

experiences.description: Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time. Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics, and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in Greater China and SEA .
experiences.title: Senior Design Consultant
